title: Al-Shabab Club Stadium - Wikipedia
snippet: Al-Shabab Club Stadium (Arabic: ملعب نادي الشباب) branded as SHG Arena for sponsorship reasons is a football stadium in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. It is the home ground of Al-Shabab Club.

title: Al-Shabab Club Stadium | Saudi Arabia ABC
